backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two Valentine prompt features and the related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend Valentine components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with Valentine color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading fonts and mounting the React app into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app flow handling first-entry prompt, reveal screen, and rendering all Valentine sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Closin: Closing section with hearts, final message, and buttons to replay or scroll to top.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FirstE: Full-screen prompt asking “Do you love me?” with a moving No button and a Yes button that proceeds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/games/: An interactive love‑themed quiz with multiple questions, scoring, and a results screen with restart option.
A memory matching game using icon pairs, tracking moves, matches, and win state with reset support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeroSe: Hero banner with animated hearts, background image, and button to scroll to the message section.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Messag: Romantic message section with user-photo background, overlay, and styled paragraphs from config.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PlaySe: Game section switching between Memory Match and Love Quiz with themed layout and buttons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: A fixed navigation bar with buttons that scroll to page sections and a replay trigger.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: A full‑screen animated Valentine reveal screen with floating hearts and a button that triggers onReveal.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: A layout wrapper that centers content and optionally adds a repeating Valentine pattern background.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Static configuration for Valentine text content such as headlines, messages, and intro copy.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting no backend queries are required for the Valentine page.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and extended theme settings using project CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for the Valentine mini‑game prompt with an evasive No button.
